column1: 1On 1st February 2017 Birmingham Children's  NHS Foundation Trust merged with Birmingham Woman's NHS Foundation Trust . Data prior to February 2017 for Birmingham Children's  NHS Foundation Trust merged with Birmingham Woman's NHS Foundation Trust are combined and displayed under Birmingham Woman's and Children's  NHS Foundation Trust.

2On 1st October 2017 Central Manchester University Hospital NHS Trust merged with University of South Manchester NHS Foundation Trust. Data prior to October 2017 for Central Manchester University Hospital NHS Trust merged with University of South Manchester NHS Foundation Trust are combined and displayed under Manchester University Hospital NHS Trust.

3 On 1st April 2017 Peterborough and Stamford Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust merged with Hinchingbrooke Health Care NHS Trust. Data prior to April 2017 for Peterborough and Stamford Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust merged with Hinchingbrooke Health Care NHS Trust are combined and displayed under North West Anglia NHS Foundation Trust.
Data cells with red numbers indicate that these figures have been amended since the previous monthly publication.

Acute Trust are highlighted in grey where they have  failed to sign off their data for three months or more. Failure to sign off may be indicative of missing data and/or a data quality issues. Further detail can be found on the caveats page.
NB: Wirral University Teaching Hospital NHS Trust did not submitted E. coli bacteraemia data in financial year 2014/15.
